Open Standard Media (OSM) Player Presentations These are the presentations for the Drupal MediaFront module with the Open Standard Media (OSM) Player


This player is build using the following code.

<script type="text/javascript">
  $(function() {
    $("#osmplayer").osmplayer({
      playlist: '/osmplayer/presentations.xml',
      logo: '/assets/osmplayer/logo.png',
      height: '500px'
    });
  });
</script>
<div id="osmplayer"></div>

Using the following playlist from YouTube.

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<playlist version="1" xmlns="http://xspf.org/ns/0/">
   <trackList>
      <track>
         <title>MediaFront 2.0 Intro</title>
         <location>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZZ3z0ko-uRU</location>
         <image>http://i3.ytimg.com/vi/ZZ3z0ko-uRU/hqdefault.jpg</image>
      </track>
      <track>
         <title>Presenting Media - Dallas Drupal Meetup</title>
         <location>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k7tbGXjMRWQ</location>
         <image>http://i3.ytimg.com/vi/NHazdYqCWp4/hqdefault.jpg</image>
      </track>
   </trackList>
</playlist>
